title: Muryeong’s Spirit - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Mystery   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Devoted Love Interests   Fantasy World   Ghosts   Modern Day   Mystery Solving   Naive Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start
author: 오늘봄
description:
Kim Muryeong, the youngest member of the famous exorcist family.
He grew up with love from his whole family,
He was evaluated as a genius that comes once every 100 years.

'Muryeong, let me ask you a favor.'

After entering high school, Muryeong started working as a simple exorcist.

The elevator to the apartment feels weird.
I keep having nightmares these days.
Even things like getting rid of stalkers and acting like boyfriends.

He was more of a problem solver instead of an exorcist.
To the Muryeong who watches and sees everyone,
There were no requests that he couldn’t accept.

However, even for such a person, there was someone he avoided.….

'Ki Hwanyeong?'

Tall and handsome. With a scary atmosphere,
Ki Hwanyeong who was rude and had no friends.

One day, Ki Hwanyeoung came to visit Muryeong.

'My shoulders feel heavy these days.'
>
